def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_x_medium = is_medium(x, ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_y_light = is_light(y, ctx)
        check_z_smaller_x = are_smaller([z], [x], ctx)
        check_yz_below_x = are_below([y,z], [x], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_line
            and check_x_medium
            and check_x_dark
            and check_y_light
            and check_z_smaller_x
            and check_yz_below_x
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
